channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13950] Add a NoopProcedureStore for testing
item.description:
Add a NoopProcedureStore and an helper in ProcedureTestingUtil to submitAndWait() a procedure without having to do anything else.
This is useful to avoid extra code like in case of TestAssignmentManager.processServerShutdownHandler()

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment

against branch-1 branch at commit 9db3ea3406748799b7fc36f9d88aac04e02d8fc4.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12741181

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 6 new or modified tests.

-1 javac. The patch appears to cause mvn compile goal to fail with Hadoop version 2.2.0.

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn post-site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .
